00029 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00030 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00031 from PyQt4.uic import *
00032 from Koo.Common import Common
00033 import copy
00034 from Koo import Rpc
00035 
00036 (TranslationDialogUi, TranslationDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('translationdialog.ui') ) 
00037 
00038 ## @brief TranslationDialog class provides a dialog for translating the value of a
00039 # translatable field.
00040 class TranslationDialog( QDialog, TranslationDialogUi ):
00041         LineEdit = 0
00042         TextEdit = 1
00043 
00044         ## @brief Constructs a new TranslationDialog object.
00045         def __init__(self, id, model, fieldName, value, type, parent = None):
00046                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00047                 TranslationDialogUi.__init__(self)
00048                 self.setupUi( self )
00049 
00050                 self.connect( self.pushAccept, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotAccept )
00051                 self.setWindowTitle( _('Translation Dialog') )
00052                 self.id = id
00053                 self.model = model
00054                 self.fieldName = fieldName
00055                 self.value = value
00056                 self.type = type
00057 
00058                 self.translations = []
00059                 self.result = value
00060                 # Using the timer should improve user feedback
00061                 QTimer.singleShot( 0, self.init )
00062 
00063         def adaptContext(self, value):
00064                 if value == 'en_US':
00065                         return False
00066                 else:
00067                         return value
00068 
00069         def init(self):
00070                 self.currentCode = Rpc.session.context.get('lang', 'en_US')
00071 
00072                 languageIds = Rpc.session.execute( '/object', 'execute', 'res.lang', 'search', [('translatable','=','1')])
00073                 languages = Rpc.session.execute( '/object', 'execute', 'res.lang', 'read', languageIds, ['code', 'name'] )
00074                 languages.append( {'code': 'en_US', 'name': 'English'} )
00075 
00076                 layout = QGridLayout()
00077                 self.layout().insertLayout(0, layout)
00078                 for lang in languages:
00079                         uiLabel = QLabel( lang['name'] + ':', self)
00080                         if self.type == TranslationDialog.LineEdit:
00081                                 uiText = QLineEdit(self)
00082                         else:
00083                                 uiText = QTextEdit(self)
00084 
00085                         row = layout.rowCount() + 1
00086                         layout.addWidget( uiLabel, row, 0 )
00087                         layout.addWidget( uiText, row, 1 )
00088 
00089                         if lang['code'] == self.currentCode:
00090                                 uiText.setText( self.value )
00091                                 self.translations.append( { 'code': lang['code'], 'widget': uiText, 'value': self.getText(uiText) } )
00092                                 continue
00093 
00094                         context = copy.copy(Rpc.session.context)                        
00095                         context['lang'] = self.adaptContext( lang['code'] )
00096                         val = Rpc.session.execute( '/object', 'execute', self.model, 'read', [self.id], [self.fieldName], context)
00097                         val = val[0]
00098                         uiText.setText( val[self.fieldName] or '' )
00099                         self.translations.append( { 'code': lang['code'], 'widget': uiText, 'value': self.getText(uiText) } )
00100 
00101         def getText(self, widget):
00102                 if self.type == TranslationDialog.LineEdit:
00103                         return unicode(widget.text())
00104                 else:
00105                         return unicode(widget.document().toPlainText())
00106                 
00107         def slotAccept(self):
00108                 for lang in self.translations:
00109                         newValue = self.getText( lang['widget'] )
00110                         # Don't update on the server the current text. This would cause information
00111                         # on the server to be updated after the form has been read causing possible
00112                         # conflits.
00113                         if lang['code'] == self.currentCode:
00114                                 self.result = newValue
00115                                 continue
00116                         # Only update on the server if the value has changed
00117                         if newValue == lang['value']:
00118                                 continue
00119                         context = copy.copy(Rpc.session.context)
00120                         context['lang'] = self.adaptContext( lang['code'] )
00121                         Rpc.session.execute( '/object', 'execute', self.model, 'write', [self.id], {self.fieldName: newValue}, context )
00122                 self.accept()
00123
